resources.string:
v = 1, High Level (陰平)
x = 2, Medium Rising (陰上)
q = 3, Medium Level (陰去)
vv = 4, Low Falling (陽平)
xx = 5, Low Rising (陽上)
qq = 6, Low Level (陽去)
Start with “v”, then enter Cangjie5 code. For example, enter “vdam”, candidate “查” will appear. Candidates will be displayed with the corresponding Jyutping.
Start with “r”, then enter Pinyin code. For example, enter “rcha”, candidate “查” will appear. Candidates will be displayed with the corresponding Jyutping.
Start with “x”, then enter Stroke code. For example, enter “xwsad”, candidate “木” will appear. Candidates will be displayed with the corresponding Jyutping.
Start with “q”, then enter two Jyutping syllables. For example, enter “qmukdaan”, candidate “查” will appear. Candidates will be displayed with the corresponding Jyutping.
